meanings.definition: To pester or annoy someone persistently.
meanings.sent1: Stop noodging me to clean my room!
meanings.sent2: She keeps noodging her brother to share his toys.
meanings.sent3: The little dog was noodging the big dog to play with him.
meanings.sent4: Her constant noodging was like a buzzing fly in my ear.
meanings.sent5: The salesperson wouldn't stop noodging me to buy the product.

meanings.definition: The act of persistently pestering or annoying someone.
meanings.sent1: His constant noodging was starting to get on my nerves.
meanings.sent2: She was tired of the noodging from her little sister.
meanings.sent3: The noodging from the telemarketer was relentless.
meanings.sent4: The noodging of the dripping faucet was driving me crazy.
meanings.sent5: The noodging of the alarm clock finally woke him up.
